entry.title: Russia Hits a Dead End in Bakhmut
entry.content: Victory in Bakhmut has given Russia something to show for its efforts after months without any meaningful gain, but its forces appear unable to capitalize on it.

entry.title: With Psych Wards Full, Mentally Ill Accused of Crimes Languish in Jail
entry.content: Those referred for treatment in order to stand trial can wait behind bars longer than the sentence for the crime they’re charged with.

entry.title: Russia Follows Barrage on Kyiv With More Drone, Missile Attacks
entry.content: The strikes targeted military facilities and infrastructure in an escalating campaign to disrupt Ukraine’s preparations for an offensive it has signaled could be imminent.
